content.title: Intro
content.content:
1962
Preceded by
1962
1963
Year
1964
Followed by
1964

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1963.

content.title: February
content.content:
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Julie Cape.
20 - Author Rainer Nagel is born.
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs Gill.
22 - Jane Neave, aunt of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

content.title: March
content.content:
10 - Actor Steve Staley is born.
11 - Producer Zane Weiner is born.
23 - Mr. and Mrs. Kloos write a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.

content.title: April
content.content:
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to a couple he met on holiday.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing a letter to Mr. and Mrs. Kloos.

content.title: May
content.content: 6 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing a letter to Mr. and Mrs. Kloos.

content.title: June
content.content:
9 - Actress Megan Edwards is born.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 245.

content.title: July
content.content: 8 - J.R.R. Tolkien's paper "English and Welsh" is published in Angles and Britons: O'Donnell Lectures, a collection of lectures from the University of Wales.

content.title: September
content.content:
18 - Writer Gary Russell is born.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 247.
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing a letter to Eileen Elgar.
25 - Actor Mikael Persbrandt is born.
30 - Music producer Carvin Knowles is born.

content.title: October
content.content:
3 - J.R.R. Tolkien posts a letter to Eileen Elgar.
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 248.
15 - While dining, J.R.R. Tolkien saves the life of an old lady who nearly choked on a whiting-bone.[1]
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 249.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 249a.
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs. Munby.
29 - Actor Jed Brophy is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 250.
10 - Hobbits and Heroes, which includes extracts of an interview with J.R.R. Tolkien, is published in The Sunday Telegraph.
22 - C.S. Lewis dies.
26 - J.R.R. Tolkien, James Dundas-Grant, Robert Havard, Owen Barfield and Christopher Tolkien attend the funeral of C.S. Lewis.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George Sayer.

content.title: December
content.content:
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jared C. Lobdell.
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to a Miss Clark.
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Baronne A. Baeyens.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jonathan Hepworth.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 253.

? - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is published in the US.
Years
1960 1961 1962 1963 1964 1965 1966

content.content: â†‘ Christina Scull and Wayne G. Hammond (2006), The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: I. Chronology, p. 609
